Description:
An Exceptional Horse Property On 13 Acres!
Perfectly located in the picturesque Hills town of Macclesfield is this absolutely magnificent 13 acre (approx) horse property that needs to be seen to be truly appreciated. From the moment that you arrive you are sure to fall in love with this property that has been designed to cater to a horse enthusiasts every need. There are 8 separate paddocks all with water, and electric fencing (Electro braid). The spacious front paddock has a gated shelter and a horse float shelter. There is a huge machinery shed, under cover horse wash, sand day yard, tack room, hay shed and 2 separate loose boxes with day yards. The perfectly presented brick home offers 3 bedrooms master with ensuite, plus a study, 2 updated bathrooms, central light and bright kitchen with dishwasher and open plan lounge and dining room. Special features include ducted gas heating, as well as a Coonara wood heater and a split system. With a great horse riding trail that leads from the property to the local Pony Club grounds you can enjoy pleasure riding or for the more serious equestrian pursuits, you can take advantage of the facilities in the pony club grounds. This is an exceptional and sought after horse property!
Insights: 17 Coopers Road, Macclesfield VIC 3782 was last sold in 2020 and 1 other 3 bedroom house in Macclesfield have recently been sold.

Description:
The Heart of Emerald at your Doorstep
This characterful double-story weatherboard with 6 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms is one of the few original buildings in Emerald and dates back to circa 1900 when it was home to Constable Lawrence Fleming. Lovingly restored & improved, the home offers ample accommodation over two levels for a large family or for a dual, triple or even quadruple occupancy set-up. If you work from home or have a home-based business the floor-plan could work really well for you with multiple entry points.
Arguably the best location in the community-minded Emerald, the home sits on a corner block (NRZ1 zoning has development potential STCA) overlooking the puffing billy tracks and a very short stroll to shops, cafes, services, the primary school and lots of longer walks through Pepys Land, Emerald Lake, Wrights Forest and more. Take it all in from the picture-perfect cottage gardens or from the veranda that wraps around the east and north side of the upper level.
The gardens are beautifully maintained and stocked with all manner of cottage garden plants including a climbing wisteria bursting with plump lavender blooms in the spring months. There are plenty of outdoor spaces to enjoy including a BBQ area, front porch & rear patio sitting area as well as some lawn and a large open parking space.
Inside, original baltic pine floorboards & timber panelling line the large formal front lounge with floor to ceiling colonial windows. A country kitchen with 900mm range cooker, Asko dishwasher, plenty of bench space and storage lies beyond the meals area. A second living space, again with colonial windows and a sliding door that opens onto an outdoor entertaining area. A bedroom, spa bathroom & laundry complete the downstairs.
Up the beautiful timber balustraded stairwell and we find 5 more bedrooms and 3 more bathrooms each exquisitely decorated with fine fixtures and fittings. 4 of the 5 bedrooms open onto the veranda.
Currently run as a B&B - the chattels, website and goodwill can be negotiated as part of the sale.
To fully comprehend the floor plan and quality of this property make an appointment to view. Call Sue Colic on 0421 772 610.
Insights: 14 Kilvington Drive, Emerald VIC 3782 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Look no further!
If you have been looking for an opportunity to secure safe, low maintenance living with an excellent Emerald address, then look no further!
This 2 bedroom brick veneer unit is within walking distance to shops, schools and cafés, and is located on the high side of the unit complex.
Low maintenance concrete path and gardens welcome you to the veranda which is big enough for table and chairs so you can sit and watch the world go by.
Inside, the lounge room is large, welcoming and bright with wall to wall carpet and large front windows. Exposed brick walls feature throughout the home and there is a gas wall furnace to keep you cozy over the winter months.
The kitchen is open and user friendly with plenty of bench space that can be used as a breakfast bar if you dont feel like sitting at the table in the adjacent dining space. Alternately, you can exit through the glass sliding doors and dine outside in your own secure rear yard.
There are 2 good sized bedrooms, both with double built in robes, and the bathroom is equally as spacious. The laundry is cleverly located off the bathroom and also has plenty of room and a bench for folding clothes so that the washing doesnt feel like a chore.
Complete with 1.5kW solar, this unit is just waiting for someone to move in and make it their own!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
RESORT STYLE LIVING ON OVER 2 ACRES
Privately positioned on over 2 acres, overlooking rolling pastures & a stunning ferngully, is this large modern home that oozes a timeless appeal throughout and needs to be seen to be truly appreciated. Impressive in every way with an incredibly warm and inviting atmosphere, there is plenty on offer for the whole family to enjoy.
With 2 separate spacious living zones that include a large rumpus, family room with meals area & an adjoining kitchen that is simply gorgeous, featuring stone waterfall benchtops and quality stainless steel appliances including 900mm Ilve oven and a butlers pantry to hide the mess as you entertain your friends that will be nagging to come over.
There are 4 generous bedrooms, 3 with BIR's and master with stunning hotel style ensuite & walk in robe, whilst the remaining bedrooms are all serviced by the equally lavish main bathroom boasting floor to ceiling tiles and double vanity. Downstairs provides an additional living area that would be ideal for a home gym, cinema or 5th bedroom.
Special features include gas ducted heating, coonara, ducted vacuum, bamboo timber flooring, reverse cycle heating & cooling, large windows that allow plenty of natural light to flow through & a fresh modern colour scheme throughout.
Outside there is a beautiful solar heated in-ground pool which creates a lifestyle of luxury with plenty of areas to enjoy BBQ's, sun baking or simply just relaxing 'resort style'! There is also a large covered entertaining area overlooking the pool, which is perfect to sit back and relax as the kids play. The generous 4 car garage is perfect for the car enthusiast and offers concrete floor, power and internally lined walls.
This property will have you questioning whether you'll ever feel the need to visit your favorite holiday resort again. Don't miss the opportunity to discover what is possible when nature and luxury are combined.
Insights: 32 Sydney Avenue, Emerald VIC 3782 was last sold in 2020 and 9 other 5 bedroom house in Emerald have recently been sold.

Description:
DESIGNER STYLE, CENTRAL LOCATION & MASSIVE SHED ON 1460M2
When time is precious and a turn-key solution is what you're looking for this beautiful home is sure to be the one that captures your heart!
The home offers modern style throughout including open-plan living featuring a stunning kitchen with Caesarstone waterfall island bench, quality stainless steel 900mm cooker, inset sink, integrated dishwasher, soft-close drawers providing plenty of storage space and beautiful polished floors.
There are 3 bedrooms, the master has a built in robe; all are serviced by the impressive family bathroom that features a raised vanity, floor to ceiling tiles, large shower, modern tapware and a luxurious freestanding deep bath perfect for the relaxed lifestyle youre sure to be living. Special features include gas ducted heating, split system heating and cooling and ceiling fans ensuring year round comfort. New carpets, designer style and neutral tones create a highly desirable home. Get-togethers with family and friends and alfresco dining will be a delight on the covered deck while overlooking the perfectly maintained lawn and stunning landscaped gardens.
There is dual access including a second sealed driveway that leads to the massive shed that is ideal for tradies, car enthusiasts, hobbyists or those just wanting that extra storage space.
Located within walking distance to the highly renowned Bam Bams Italian restaurant, General Store, Secondary College, football field and netball courts along with public transport, this rare opportunity is sure to be snapped up quickly, so call today to arrange your inspection!

Description:
THE PERFECT FAMILY HOME ON ALMOST 1 ACRE
A beautiful example of true family living, this home offers something for everyone. Set on a stunning block of almost 1 acre, there is room to run, play or just sit back on the expansive timber decking and take in the glorious surrounds of nearby green fields and filtered tree tops. There are 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 2 separate, spacious living zones which makes this floorplan family friendly and ideal for a bit of space for all the family. A charming wood fire creates a beautiful warmth on those cooler nights while GDH runs throughout and is both quick and convenient. The kitchen is in its original design and is centrally located between both living areas. It boasts stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and plenty of bench space. Outside is just paradise with so much room to enjoy. Great car parking and a double garage with internal access provides plenty of options for tradies and the like and the yard is fully fenced with car access to the rear. A perfect family home to love and enjoy in a wonderful location.

Description:
FAMILY FRIENDLY IN THE HEART OF GEMBROOK
Set in the picturesque town of Gembrook with the iconic Puffing Billy chugging into the station nearby, this 10 year young Ramseys built home offers the ultimate versatile floorplan for the growing family and an outdoor entertainment area that is sure to be the envy of your friends.
Featuring:
4/5 bedrooms the main with WIR, full ensuite
Spacious open plan living/dining and kitchen
The kitchen boasts a walk- in pantry, SS appliances, an abundance of storage and bench space. Park your car in the double garage and bring the groceries straight into the pantry!!!
Separate lounge and Billiard room that could easily become bedrooms 4 and 5 if required.
Both the laundry and family bathroom are spacious.
Outdoors showcases a huge covered entertaining zone with wood fire, an inbuilt BBQ and enough room for friends, family and a footy team.
You have a fenced allotment of just over 1100 m2 and a lawned area for four- legged family members.
All seasons are catered for, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, spilt system and ceiling fans.
Walk to school, walk into town enjoy a hot pie and latte, maybe dinner from The Independent restaurant and enjoy all that Gembrook has to offer. Youll love living here.
Call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 or Janet Hawkins 0409 117 432
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing.
With the COVID 19 outbreak, the health and wellbeing of our clients and staff is our highest priority.
We are all taking extra measures to protect our clients and staff from coming into contact with the virus. Please help us by respecting our request that you do not attend an Inspection or the office if you have:
- Tested positive to Coronavirus
- Symptoms associated with Coronavirus
- Recently been in contact with someone diagnosed with Coronavirus
- Recently been overseas
- Agreed to any self-isolation conditions
We also ask that you practice social distancing from anyone attending the office or at an inspection, and where possible refrain from touching surfaces. We also appreciate your understanding as we are only able to have one person view the interior of the property at a time, therefore couples will be able to look at the home individually with the agent present.
Thank you for your understanding.

Description:
'Hidden Valley'
Aptly named, Hidden Valley is everything it promises and more!
Located off a sealed road, almost 300m from the main road, and only 2 minutes drive from Wellington Rd and 5 minutes drive from the Emerald Township, this 2.3 acre property is nestled among the hills in its own private oasis with Menzies Creek running along the boundary.
The driveway curls around lovingly maintained gardens, peppered with mature Conifers and Japanese Maples, to the 3 bedroom, multi-level home which has been thoughtfully designed to capture the best views of the stunning landscape.
The wide tiled foyer leads into an inviting formal lounge room with new carpets and a beautiful wood heater for that cosy feel on those cold winter days when the mist is heavy on the hills beyond the window.
Opposite the formal lounge is the master bedroom, also with new carpets and a decent walk-in robe, adjacent ensuite and additional split system air conditioning for comfortable summer sleeping.
A wide, short staircase leads to the second level of the home, where the landing has outdoor access to a large, pergola, perfect for entertaining. The additional 2 spacious, robed bedrooms, both with new carpets, are also located on this level, in addition to a large laundry with plenty of storage, separate toilet, and a delightfully modern main bathroom with huge shower and bath.
The final short ascent leads to the main living zone. The informal lounge room with new carpets and high, inclined ceilings gives access to the impressive balcony which runs the length of the home and provides the most breathtaking views of the hills in the distance and the gardens below.
The large galley style kitchen features timber bench tops, breakfast bar and stainless steel appliances, and has an abundance of bench space with views over the gardens for a joyful cooking experience. Meals can be served in the adjoining dining area or through its own glass doors to the balcony and enjoyed with a chilled drink as the sun goes down.
The grounds themselves are 2.3 acres of fenced paddocks with large sheds for animal shelter, feed storage, machinery, and breeding tubs for hens, chicks and ducklings. There is an additional smaller area next to the home fenced off for the domesticated pets.
There is also a wood shed, a potting shed, glasshouse and an enclosed, raised veggie patch for the avid gardener, making this property the ultimate working hobby farm.
In addition to the double lock up garage for the cars, there is also another huge shed with concrete floors and power, perfect for tinkering the days away.
This home has been affectionately enriched and maintained over the years to become the delight it is today. A regretful sale but first to see will buy.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
THE LATEST STYLE ON 1027m2
Situated on just over a ¼ acre this stunning home boasts the best of modern fittings including floating floors, neutral tones and stylish décor. Featuring an open plan design that is so popular for our modern lifestyle, this area combines the kitchen, meals and living. The kitchen has stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. There are 3 bedrooms, the master with full ensuite, walk in robe & study nook, and a family bathroom complete with bath and raised vanity that services the remaining rooms. Ducted heating, evaporative cooling throughout, split system to living room, air-conditioner in the master and ceiling fans ensure year round comfort. Outdoors there is a sealed driveway, double carport, shedding/workshop with power and a covered outdoor area that is ideal for alfresco dining. Currently tenanted for $2167 pcm until 20 April 2021, you can secure a great property and have an income to assist with your mortgage payments. Walking distance to the Wright State Forest, Emerald Lake Park and renowned restaurant and within easy reach of the bus stop, this is a property that will cater to your every need.

Description:
Beauty in Nature!
This magnificently presented 3 bedroom home is located on a quiet road in sought after Avonsleigh, and backs onto Wattle Creek in the idyllic Wrights Forest.
This stunning character home with dark vertical timbers welcomes you onto the wide, covered veranda where you can admire the views and sounds of nature before stepping into the serenity within. The generous lounge with wood heater and split system features exposed beam roof and large colonial windows which infuses the home with light and captures the essence of the environment.
The adjoining space comprises an open, workable kitchen with classy subway tiles and dark bench tops, and a large designated dining area that is complimented by gorgeous vinyl floorboards. This area has achieved the delicate balance of open space and cosy comfort though the large windows which overlook the front garden.
There are 3 good sized bedrooms with ceiling fans, the second with a large corner window which enhances the natural aspect that can be felt throughout the home. A good sized main bathroom is conveniently located to service the bedrooms and main living areas and features a classic claw foot bath, in keeping with the character features.
The master bedroom has a walk in robe with beautifully renovated ensuite and glass door access onto the veranda, which begins at the front and wraps around to the back of the home, culminating in a large covered entertaining area that makes you feel as if you are in a tree house where you can sit back and watch as Puffing Billy rolls by.
Stairs at the rear of the deck lead to the laundry and storage area under the house. The yard is fully fenced for animals and children and meanders to a flatter area at the embankment of the creek. There are areas for wood storage, a garden shed and a bungalow, or workshop with power. There is access to the rear of the yard for extra parking if the 4 off street car parks arent enough.
Properties of this calibre, with this aspect never last long.
**CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!**
Bethany Day 0438 844 968

Description:
Walk to Town with Nothing to do but Move in!
If you are looking for the next step, this beautifully presented property has everything a growing family could want. The open plan living, spacious rooms and 9 ceilings give a sense of grandeur while still maintaining the warmth and comfort that stimulates a happy family dynamic.
The large kitchen with walk in pantry, dining area, and family room make up the heart of the home, and provides the perfect setting for entertaining. The covered alfresco area gives a relaxing vibe for adult conversation while young kids can be supervised playing in the adjacent living room. The older kids may enjoy a cinematic experience in the purpose built theatre room, complete with large screen and surround sound, while the adults soak in the outdoor covered spa, or enjoy the views of nature from the large front deck.
The master bedroom has a walk through robe to ensuite, while the remaining 2 bedrooms, also with built in robes, are zoned away and serviced by a good sized bathroom and separate toilet. Additionally, the home also offers an open study, perfect for an office or study space.
For year round comfort the home has ducted heating, split system, large laundry and a solar hot water system. The yard is fully fenced for security for kids and pets and also features sealed driveway, landscaped gardens, garden shed, kids cubby and double carport.
Just a short stroll to schools, restaurants, shops and the iconic Puffing Billy, this property really does offer the kind of lifestyle your friends and family will envy.
**CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!**
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
ESCAPE To Your Own Private Retreat - 26 Acres of Secluded Bush!
**CALL SAMANTHA SCOTT ON 0438680032 TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION CONDUCTED ACCORDING TO SOCIAL DISTANCING GUIDELINES **
If being surrounded by nature is important, this acreage property will provide a bush haven that you can truly enjoy.
Escape the rat race on weekends to this 26 acres of private bush complete with a creek in stunning Gembrook.
Pitch the tent, ride the motobike or just enjoy hours of bush walking in the privacy of your own property.
This property offers absolute seclusion where you can enjoy the abundance of native wildlife in the area - an amazing escape where you can breathe fresh air and enjoy native plants and animals.
Be serenaded by the call of Kookaburras and Currawongs and catch glimpses of the resident wallabies, lyrebirds and wombats.
The location of this property provides distant views of the surrounding hills.
This is the private bush retreat you have been dreaming of!
All reasonable offers will be considered.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
KOOKABURRA COTTAGE' ON ONE FLAT ACRE
Nestled beautifully on a fully fenced one acre of picture perfect colourful landscaped gardens is this stunning character home that is the epitome of country living. Loaded with charm and beauty the home boasts wrap around verandah, bay windows, hardwood polished floors and exceptional presentation and offers a large lounge and dining room, a big timber kitchen complete with huge bench space, under bench oven, hot plates and dishwasher and family room that has double doors out to the covered outdoor area. There are four bedrooms, the master with walk in robe and ensuite. The remaining bedrooms have built in robes and are serviced by the family bathroom that features tessellated tiles and a deep claw foot bath that will allow you to soak away your cares. Reverse cycle heating and cooling and ceiling fans ensure year round comfort. Outdoors offers everything you can imagine including remote front gates, a double remote garage, driveway access to the rear, double carport ideal for a caravan or boat, a separate workshop, under cover storage, chicken pen and expansive grassed areas that will cater to a game of cricket or football and an outdoor kitchenette to make entertaining a breeze. Imagine celebrating your teams grand final win, a special birthday or even a wedding surrounded by this spectacular leafy setting. Made road access, school buses passing and a 10 minute drive to Pakenham or Emerald makes this the perfect place to enjoy country living at its very best.
Insights: 560 Paternoster Road, Mount Burnett VIC 3781 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
A MUCH LOVED HOME IN CENTRAL EMERALD ON ONE ACRE
For more than 30 years this property has been a much loved haven for the current owners. Set in the middle of a lush setting that features a variety of colourful ornamental trees and shrubs and with the hidden beauty of an abundance of bulbs that will burst forth in Spring, this is a property that will delight in all seasons. The home has a warm and welcoming atmosphere that is enhanced by the use of rich, solid timbers and beautiful parquetry floors. An enormous living room with highlight windows is where family living will excel, there is enough room for the largest gathering and a canopy fire adds warmth. A sliding door leads from this room out to a sunroom that would be perfect to settle back in with a cuppa and read a book, contemplate life or watch the prolific birdlife that frequent the garden. The kitchen is the hub of the home with modern tones, timber cupboards, dishwasher and gas cooker and has a meals area adjoining with built in wall unit, solid fuel heater and sliding door that leads out to the deck. There are four bedrooms, the master has a walk in robe and huge, two way ensuite complete with a bath. The second bathroom services the remaining bedrooms. The fourth bedroom has its own access and would also make a great work from home space. Ducted heating throughout and a reverse cycle split system ensures your comfort year round. The current owners have enjoyed every inch of the property including a huge workshop where many projects have been completed, carports and expansive grassed areas that have catered to many happy family gatherings. Situated within walking distance of the centre of Emerald, highly regarded Primary School, kindergarten and child care facilities, its now time for the owners to pass this wonderful property onto the next family.

Description:
'LITTLE BROOK'- 5 ACRES OF PRIVACY & SECLUSION
Private, secluded and surrounded by over 5 acres of lush green bushland and rolling green lawns, 'Little Brook' is a magical forest escape for anyone looking to leave the rat race of today's modern living.
Lovingly built in 1986 with many style features that have stood the test of time, the home consists of 4 spacious bedrooms that include an oversized master suite with walk through robe and ensuite.
Dual living zones are separated by a solid brick fireplace, not only acting as an amazing heat source but also as a grand feature of this appealing home. The kitchen cabinetry has been crafted from solid timber and contains stainless steel appliances, oversized range hood and a built in breakfast bar whilst adjoining one of the two outdoor entertaining areas that are on offer.
Bespoke timber panelling, alluring leadlight and bay windows, ducted vacuuming plus a mezzanine storage loft are just some of the extra features you will find at this superior sized family home.
Outside, is a nature lover's playground! A large 7.6m x 12m shed, double carport plus more undercover storage for tractors boats and bikes will be more than sufficient for most whilst for the garden lovers, there is a 13,000ltr water tank, vegetable garden plus multiple hot houses where you can plant, grow and enjoy.
The trickling spring fed creek runs into your very own dam meaning there is an endless water supply along with a sprinkler system already in place to keep your garden looking at its best all year round. You will also enjoy the abundance of birds and wildlife that also take joy from what the picturesque dam has to offer. Whether it's a forest walk or relaxing on the decking taking in the colourful surrounds of your very own piece of paradise, this property offers a lifestyle like no other. Only minutes from Emerald Village yet a world away from reality 'Little Brook' is sure to surpass all of your expectations for a remarkable family lifestyle.

Description:
FIRST TIME FOR SALE ON OVER ½ AN ACRE
Built for the current owner, this much loved home has been their haven for 41years. Situated in one of Emerald's premier locations on 2587m2 the home features walls of windows that provide a garden view from every angle and offers all of the privacy you crave. Doors lead out from the two living areas to a full length deck where hours can be spent taking in the beauty that surrounds, enjoying the abundance of colourful birds that frequent the property and watching the children romp around the expansive grassed area. Designed to make family living easy, the master bedroom with built in robes and full ensuite and the fourth bedroom are at one end of the home making the ideal set up for a nursery or study. The remaining bedrooms are at the other end of the home and allow privacy for all. The family bathroom services these rooms. The central timber kitchen has a meals/family area adjoining and the living room can continue the open living feel or can be closed off to provide a quiet place to watch a movie. There is a double carport, plenty of off street parking and garden shed for storage. Walk to Emerald Lake Park where there is a variety of trails to explore or stroll into the town centre where a variety of shops, cafes and sporting facilities can be found as well as our high regarded Primary School, kindergarten and child minding facilities. If you've been looking for a home with real heart, this is the property for you.

Description:
Luxury Living in Gembrook!
This outstanding property is located within walking distance to parks, shops, schools, restaurants and public transport.
Set privately at the rear of the acre block, this property impresses from the moment you enter from the street. The extended driveway meanders through spectacular landscaped gardens before arriving at the stunning residence.
The beautiful stain glass front door opens onto a tiled entrance walking through to the formal lounge, 9ft ceilings, ornate cornice, ceiling rose and this room features gas log fire, French doors and quality furnishings.
The Master bedroom features bay window, built in robes and leads through to the large ensuite with full size spa and huge picture window from ceiling to edge of spa.
The kitchen is bright and light with all Asko appliances, wall oven, steamer, gas black cooktop and integrated dishwasher.
Meals/sunroom is the perfect place to relax and enjoy the morning sun while reading the paper or having coffee.
Extended Lounge has two sets of French doors leading out onto 100sqmetres of merbu deck and BBQ area.
Three queen size bedrooms all with BIR, separate Toilet and Bathroom with huge windows looking out onto the garden and a full-size bath. Laundry has plenty of storage and fully integrated Asko Washer and Dryer.
The 2 car garage that is part of the home and has access off the kitchen and the rear entertaining deck, can also be used as another living area with the addition of carpet tiles and an ingenious window and flyscreen system that sits in tracks and can be rolled down and sealed into place when the garage door is rolled up, allowing fresh air to flow easily through.
Outside is a beautiful manicured garden that can be seen from every window in the house. A huge grassed area is perfect for children to play, there is also a Secret Fairy Garden at the rear of the property for children to explore.
The property also features gas ducted heating split system air conditioning, double glazed windows, fire rated flyscreens, watering system throughout the gardens, 3 garden sheds, 2 water tanks and solar hot water. There is also an additional garage/workshop that accommodates 2 cars.
This home is one that leaves a lasting impression for its impeccable quality, styling and aesthetics in addition to ticking every single box.
Nothing to be done but just move in and enjoy.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Richard Birtchnell 0438 747 357

Description:
Opportunity Not To Be Missed
This is an opportunity not to be missed! Set in one of the most convenient locations to Emerald, Avonsleigh and Cockatoo, this property is a first home buyer, or downsizers dream.
The quaint WARRINA is as neat as a pin and sits proudly on ½ acre of established gardens, overlooking the street and beyond, into Wrights Forest.
The home has a sealed driveway and is entered into by a staircase leading to the front veranda where you can sit and watch the world go by.
The foyer leads you to the large living area with a window that faces the street and a beautiful stone mantlepiece and hearth surrounding a Coonara big enough to heat the entire house. The combined meals and kitchen area features dark timber cabinets, wall oven and an abundance of bench space and light that filters through the windows overlooking the garden.
All 3 bedrooms are of good size and have built in robes and easy access to the large bathroom. The laundry is conveniently positioned next to the kitchen with its own outdoor access, onto the large rear pergola and timber deck, perfect for entertaining all year round.
Additionally, the home features evaporative cooling, natural gas ducted heating and single garage, and there is another 6 x 4 shed, for all your tools and machinery. There is also provision for another driveway off the street for someone with the vision.
This property is more than a house; it is a home on a good size block. These properties are becoming more and more sought after and are becoming increasingly harder to find.
Dont delay.
**CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!**
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
Location! Location! Location!!
Literally a stones throw from the heart of Emerald, this comfortable 3 bedroom/1 bathroom brick home is freshly painted & ready for you to move in & enjoy the convenience of walking to town.
The home has zoned bedrooms with the spacious, robed Master at one end and 2 further robed bedrooms and the family bathroom at the other end of the open plan living, dining and kitchen space.
There is a toasty wood heater to keep you warm in winter and a split system for hassle free, year-round comfort.
Add to this external shutters for privacy and security, and outside there is a lovely, private, undercover deck for entertaining surrounded by lush established gardens.
Situated on a flat, corner block, just over 1/3 of an acre this property is fully fenced and has 3 sheds with concrete floor to take care of your cars and workshop needs.
Opportunities like this, perfect as a first home, a downsize or an investment, in such a great location dont come along very often, so make sure this one is on your must-see list!
